m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- SMART BUILDING MANAGER United States Patent Application 20100324962 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: A building manager includes a communications interface configured to receive information from a smart energy grid. The building manager further includes an integrated control layer configured to receive inputs from and to provide outputs to a plurality of building subsystems.
